member.name: STORAGE_RPMB_DESCRIPTOR
member.summary: To interface with the Replay Protected Memory Block (RPMB), applications first need to query whether the device contains an RPMB and the max payload size the RPMB supports. To do this, the application sends IOCTL_STORAGE_QUERY_PROPERTY IOCTL with set to StorageAdapterRpmbProperty (defined in STORAGE_PROPERTY_QUERY in ntddstor.h). Storport then responds with the following payload (defined in ntddstor.h) when is set to PropertyStandardQuery.

member.name: STORAGE_RPMB_DESCRIPTOR.SizeInBytes
member.summary: The size of the RPMB, in bytes. 0 if not supported, RPMB size in bytes otherwise.

member.name: STORAGE_RPMB_DESCRIPTOR.MaxReliableWriteSizeInBytes
member.summary: The maximum amount of data supported in one transaction in bytes. 0 if not supported, minimum 512 bytes.

member.name: STORAGE_RPMB_DESCRIPTOR.FrameFormat
member.summary: To support different RPMB frame formats, specifies which frame format the payload will be in so the port driver can take the appropriate action.
